content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Inbound and outbound protection To go to the Inbound Protection screen, choose Email and Collaboration Security Operations → Cloud Email Gateway Protection → Inbound Protection. To go to the Outbound Protection screen, choose Email and Collaboration Security Operations → Cloud Email Gateway Protection → Outbound Protection.
